mapper.insert: INSERT INTO provincial_warning (external_id, company_code, risk_level, push_type, warning_time, raw_json, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{externalId}, #{companyCode}, #{riskLevel}, #{pushType}, #{warningTime}, CAST(#{rawJson} AS JSON), NOW(3), NOW(3)) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE company_code = VALUES(company_code), risk_level = VALUES(risk_level), push_type = VALUES(push_type), warning_time = VALUES(warning_time), raw_json = VALUES(raw_json), updated_at = NOW(3)
mapper.select: SELECT id, external_id, company_code, risk_level, push_type, warning_time, JSON_PRETTY(raw_json) AS raw_json FROM provincial_warning ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
